document.full_text: goldman sachs group's  whitehall real estate funds restructured $1.42 billion of debt due april 2012 on one of its largest hotel portfolios, the wall street journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.
document.title: goldman restructures $1.42 billion hotel debt: report
lines_and_colors: goldman sachs group's  whitehall real estate funds restructured $1.42 billion of debt due april 2012 on one of its largest hotel portfolios, the wall street journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.
